程序包 researcher.management.web.rs.service

类 LabAndResearcherService

java.lang.Object
researcher.management.web.rs.service.LabAndResearcherService
public class LabAndResearcherService extends Object
This class provides the main service implementation for managing labs and researchers using a PostgreSQL database.

  • 构造器详细资料

      public LabAndResearcherService()

  • 方法详细资料

    • createResearcher

      public boolean createResearcher(researcher.management.web.rs.data.Researcher researcher)
      Creates a new researcher in the database.
      参数:
      researcher - The researcher object to be created.
      返回:
      true if the researcher is successfully created, false otherwise.

    • linkLabWithResearcher

      public boolean linkLabWithResearcher(String labName, String researcherId)
      Links a lab with a researcher by updating the lab_name attribute of the researcher in the database.
      参数:
      labName - The name of the lab to be linked with the researcher.
      researcherId - The ID of the researcher to be linked with the lab.
      返回:
      true if the link is successfully created, false otherwise.

    • deleteResearcher

      public boolean deleteResearcher(String researcherId)
      Deletes a researcher from the database using their ID.
      参数:
      researcherId - The ID of the researcher to be deleted.
      返回:
      true if the researcher is successfully deleted, false otherwise.

    • getResearcherByLab

      public List<researcher.management.web.rs.data.Researcher> getResearcherByLab(String labName)
      Retrieves a list of researchers associated with a specific lab.
      参数:
      labName - The name of the lab.
      返回:
      A list of researchers associated with the specified lab.

    • createLab

      public boolean createLab(researcher.management.web.rs.data.Lab lab)
      Creates a new lab in the database.
      参数:
      lab - The lab object to be created.
      返回:
      true if the lab is successfully created, false otherwise.

    • deleteLab

      public boolean deleteLab(String labName)
      Deletes a lab from the database using its name. Also unlinks all researchers associated with the lab.
      参数:
      labName - The name of the lab to be deleted.
      返回:
      true if the lab is successfully deleted, false otherwise.

    • getLabByName

      public researcher.management.web.rs.data.Lab getLabByName(String name)
      Retrieves a lab from the database using its name.
      参数:
      name - The name of the lab.
      返回:
      A Lab object representing the found lab, or a new Lab object with a "Not found" name and a description indicating that no lab was found.
